alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:02PM EDT until July 29 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... West central Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 502 PM EDT/402 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Donalsonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Iron City, Steam Mill, Desser, Crosby, Davis Park, Little Hope, Lela, Lovedale, Haynes, Riverturn, Two Egg, Sharphagen, Hornsville, Donaldsonville A/P, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy and Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
